text: TYPES OF DRIVE INTERFACE 1 IDE - Integrated Drives Electronics. It has 40 pins Connectors 2 EIDE - Enhance Intergated Drive Electronics. Can still b use 2 Connect %SC% H.D 3 PATA - Parallel Advanced Technology Attachment. Its used 2 connect H.D. 4 SATA - Serial Advanced Technology Attachment. 5 SCSI - Small Computer System Interface
